meaningMnemonic: Closing each <radical>eye</radical> is something that the <radical>peoples</radical> do before they <kanji>sleep</kanji>. The peoples can’t sleep with both eyes open and they can’t sleep with just one eye open either. Peoples have to close each eye before they can sleep.
readingMnemonic: The reason you want to <kanji>sleep</kanji> is because all the other peoples were <reading>mean</reading> (みん) to you. They were so mean that the only way you could get over it was to close your eyes and sleep. You just want to sleep.
